aboutDesc1: At Krishi Sangam, we connect farmers with businesses to create mutually beneficial partnerships. Farmers gain a reliable market for their produce, while businesses access consistent, high-quality crops.
aboutDesc2: Join us in building sustainable food systems and contributing to rural development. Whether you're a farmer seeking stability or a business looking for trusted suppliers, we are here to help you succeed.
offerSubtitle: Two sides of the same coin, working together for a better future.
farmerBenefit1Desc: Fair prices and security for your harvests
farmerBenefit2Desc: Assistance with financing, seeds, and equipment
farmerCTADesc: Get fair prices and guaranteed buyers for your produce.
companyBenefit3Desc: Flexible contracts tailored to your needs
companyCTADesc: Connect with verified farmers for consistent supply.
howItWorksSubtitle: Connecting the roots of agriculture with the speed of digital commerce.
step1Desc: Join our institutional network in seconds. A simple KYC process verified by our decentralized registry ensures trust for all participants.
step2Desc: Establish transparent, high-fidelity agreements. Our automated contract templates protect interests and guarantee fixed-term pricing.
step3Desc: Benefit from expert monitoring and data-driven insights. We use satellite telemetry and ground sensors to ensure optimal crop health.
step4Desc: Experience lightning-fast settlements. Payments are processed instantly upon commodity verification, securing your financial future.
testimonialsSubtitle: Real stories from real farmers and businesses
joinThousands: Join thousands of farmers and companies today
footerLogoText: Building the digital infrastructure for the future of Indian agriculture.
